long_description: A top-notch essential for commuting or touring, the waterproof Blackburn Barrier Trunk Bag keeps gear safe from the elements with tough protection. The waterproof Blackburn Barrier Trunk Bag offers an extra wide main compartment, side waterproof exterior pocket and customizable padded interior dividers. Wide main compartment opening with magnetic fobs. When used with a Blackburn Interlock Bike Rack (sold separately), the Blackburn Barrier Trunk Bag can be secured on the bike with a single key. Compatible with all standard bike racks.
short_description: A top-notch essential for commuting or touring, the waterproof Blackburn Barrier Trunk Bag keeps gear safe from the elements with tough protection.
